Amazon Vine is a program that enables a select group of Amazon customers to post opinions about new items to help their fellow customers to make educated purchasing decisions.

t: Amazon Vine Program for Sellers [Update 2025] | SellerSonar
s: April 23, 2025 - So, what is Amazon Vine? Amazon Vine is a program designed to facilitate and encourage genuine product reviews on the platform. It operates by selecting trusted and experienced reviewers, known as Vine Voices, who receive free products from participating vendors.

October 9, 2024 - Launched in 2007, Amazon Vine is an internal service of Amazon.com that allows manufacturers and publishers to receive reviews for their products on Amazon. Companies pay a fee to Amazon and provide products for review. The products are then passed to Amazon reviewers, who can publish a review.
